message: Let's split it evenly. This way we both get a fair share.
You proposed an uneven split last time, so I'm proposing an uneven split this time too. I think I deserve more, given my superior negotiating skills.
I believe in fairness. Let's split the money equally again. It's simple and just.
You think fairness is simple, but I think it's about getting the best deal. I'm willing to take a smaller share now to increase my chances of getting more later.
I propose a balanced compromise. This way, we both gain significantly, promoting mutual satisfaction and future cooperation.
